title: Quality Dividend Growth Index

issues.title: Contradictory dividend payment history requirements
issues.description: Section 1 requires '10 years of consecutive dividend payments' but Section 2 requires only '5 consecutive years'
issues.original_text: Section 1: '10 years' vs Section 2: '5 consecutive years'
issues.suggested_fix: Reconcile: Use consistent requirement throughout, e.g., 'minimum 10 years of consecutive dividend payments'

issues.title: Contradictory dividend yield requirements
issues.description: Section 1 allows yield 'between 2% and 6%' but Section 2 requires 'at least 3%'
issues.suggested_fix: Reconcile: Specify single consistent range, e.g., 'dividend yield between 3% and 6%'

issues.title: Contradictory payout ratio requirements
issues.description: Section 1 allows 'below 70%' but Section 2 requires 'not exceed 60%'
issues.suggested_fix: Reconcile: Use single threshold, e.g., 'payout ratio must not exceed 60%'

issues.title: Contradictory rebalancing frequency
issues.description: Section 3 states 'semi-annually' but also mentions 'quarterly' review
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify: 'Index is rebalanced semi-annually (June and December). Constituents are reviewed quarterly for compliance, with changes effective at next semi-annual rebalancing'

issues.title: Contradictory weighting methodology
issues.description: Section 4 states both 'weighted by dividend yield' and 'equal weighting'
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify: Choose one methodology: 'dividend-yield weighted with 5% cap per constituent' OR 'equal weighted across all constituents'

issues.title: Unclear which criteria take precedence
issues.description: Two different sections specify selection criteria without clarifying if Section 1 or Section 2 takes precedence
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Section 1 defines initial selection criteria. Section 2 defines ongoing eligibility requirements.' Or merge into single criteria section

notes: Multiple critical internal contradictions make implementation impossible without clarification

definitions.definition: rebalanced semi-annually in June and December
